ack.p: We wish to thank Inge Hollatz-Rangosch and Ayse Barut from the Cicin-Sain lab and Tatjana Hirsch from the group of Prof. Dr. Dunja Bruder for excellent technical assistance. We thank Laura McKay and Frank Carbone for useful discussions, Ramon Arens for tetramer reagents and Prof. Dr. Dirk Busch for providing us streptamer reagents.
